content.detailedDescription:
Last night i arrived in cocoa beach, florida for vacation.  today me and my family drove up to kennedy space center visitor center museum.  we got there about 5:15 pm and left and headed back towards cocoa beach, florida shortly thereafter because the visitor center was about to close.  about twenty minutes later we arrived just in front of the ron john surf shop and stopped at a red light when we noticed two very bright flashes that looked like lightning to the front of the vehichle, even though it wasn't storming and was hardly overcast.

we arrived at doubletree hotel in cocoa beach a few minutes later and tried to open our hotel room door with our key cards.  i had one in my wallet, my fiance had one in her purse.  neither card would open our door.  we went to the front desk and told the clerk so she recharged the cards so they would open the door.  both had been cleared of their magnetic signature.  the clerk told us that could happen if the card got exposed to magnetic charges or too close to a cell phone.  both cards were stored in seperate places in the vehichle, however.  which means the vehichle must have encountered a magnetic field of some sort that erased both cards.

we also had a strange interference with our gps on the way back.  we turned it on as soon as we left the visitor center and it contininuously blurted out " you are exceeding the speed limit" even when we came to almost a complete stop at a stop sign.

so, i looked on the internet, because i immediately thought it might have to do with the space port area and immediately found blogs about florida's space port  having its own magnetic field, and also about some sort of magnetisphere devise that recently arrived at the port for deployment to space in february of 2011.  only a few weeks away.

i immediately became concerned about my debit card's magnetic signature being affected, so i went to the atm and checked it out.  it appeared intact.  so whatever it was, it was strong enough to wipe out my hotel key card and my gps but not my atm card.

probably not a ufo, but definetly something very strange proven to be happening with the magnetic fields around nasa's space port located just north of cocoa beach.
content.summary: Probably not ufo, but very strange magnetic field
Bright orange blur moving fast through sky like the one in this picture no the actual picture of my sighting " further info is apprecited"

content.detailedDescription: I was at my house at about 11:30 pm. me and a friend were standing outside on my back porch smoking a cigarette. i was staring at the stars, when i noticed an unusually bright sphere. it appeared to be a bright star at first, but upon closer inspection it observed odd behavior. the object would glide about in figure-8 motions or from side to side. other times the object would fly noticeably further away from its previous position, going towards my direction. at times the object seemed to flicker or glow at different intensities. my friend denied at first that the object was anything other then a star, but upon closer inspection order by myself, he began to realize that this was not an ordinary light in the sky. when close enough, the object's body was slightly illuminated by the bright light. it appeared to be either a triangle, disk, or combination of both. (was hard to see, it is dark outside.) after seeing this, my friend was overcome with a fear i have never seen in him before, as he is a very intelligent, stolid, and skeptical individual. i felt a sense of unrest, as if something was wrong. after retreating indoors for a while, we decided to return outside to see if the object was still there, but before we could get to the door we both heard a very strange, disturbing sound. it sounded as if a cricket was chirping (think signs,but different), but with tones that were easily definable. (it sounded as if two individuals were speaking in our direct vicinity.) it is winter, and no crickets or similar insects are about that this time. after going back into my room following this, we both shared extreme feelings of dread. eventually, we gained enough courage to leave my room and inspect our surroundings. (finding nothing.) the ufo was still present when i went to sleep that night, but in a much different location in the sky. i, and other friends and family have seen this object many nights in a row, including last night. (1/15/11)
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Odd bright light in sky gliding about in odd patterns. witnessed by multiple individuals.

content.detailedDescription:
i'd like to warn you before you view the video, it can be disturbing.  you can see 2 images in each circular shape moving, bending, and turning.

     on nov. 2, 2010 at 10:14 p.M. this video was captured in the night sky of lake havasu city, az. it is truly amazing! i did lighten the beggining of the clips for better viewing.  because, this is the area where you can see 2 beings in each circular shape.
content.shape: Circle,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Excellent! beings captured in ufo

content.detailedDescription: About 3months ago,i saw an unusually bright group of lights.They were about 100yds away in an open field. looking at them thru binoculars they appeared to be glowing red white and blue after watching for 2 weeks i decided to walk accross the field,with a camera and flashlight.After about 50 yards into approach one of them rose up about 100 feet tilted at about 45 degrees and headed what i thought was my way.I ran like a scared boy dropping my flashlight.I slipped and fell on my patio,then got up ran jnside and locked the door shaking.They didnt appear for a few days. they cme back but the lights appeared smaller.About 2or 3 feet in diameter.They continue to appear nightly,ussually 1 to 3 lights on north side and 1 on field to the south .One light in particular seems to mimmic my movements ie. left right up down around.The others are strictly buisness.Other strange red white and blue figures hover around above the cloud line.My kids think i am crazy,but i am scared.This has never happened to me before and i dont know what to do. this is very real and i think not reporting it would be an injustice to man kind. please study this seriously.
content.summary: Nightly reocuriing,7pm on,seems to respond to my movements

content.detailedDescription: In july, 1985 for my 7th birthday i was given a tasco telescope and i was a super space nut.  in december 11-12 th in 1985 the geminid metor shower was going to take place, but it was going to be at 11pm-3am before you could see it well so i went to bed at 2:00pm that afternoon and my father promised to wake me to see it at 11pm.  at 11pm or right after johnny carson went off, my dad came and woke me and i took my telescope outside.  i was super excited to watch "falling stars" for the first time and we watched for a while.  about 12 or later, my dad gave up and went inside.  i was standing on a huge back porch that was about 1000 square feet.  in the back we had a pasture and a barn to the left so there was pleany of open room for viewing.  all of a sudden, from behind me going west to east was a huge form in the sky.  it was flat on the bottom and the size of at least 3 football fields as it took up most of the viewing sky.  i saw a ton of small lights that were weird white color and now know they were led type color.  my first thought was that it looked like a flying battle ship or aircraft carrier.  i remember feeling intrigued and not scared, but still get emotional and teary when i think on it.  i was thinking how suprised of its size and how low it was flying.  couldnt have been more than 1000 feet in the air if that.  since it was dark, i could not make out any defining features. but it was moving slow..And was going west to east.  then what happened next was strange, i had lost time.  i was looking at the object and the whole time could not have been more than 30 seconds before it happened.  i heard my dad call my name and say it was cold, 2am..And i needed to get my butt back inside.  i was looking at the sky still and the ufo was gone.  i was confused but not lightheaded or anything.  i didnt tell him as i knew he would make fun of me or think i was lying..And my father was not forgiving with lying or pranks.  there is no doubt in my mind this happened and i saw it.  i have been in military intelligence and had a top seceret clearance.  i am a very reliable witness and doing research and reporting myself i tell you you can take out fatique, dosing off, or any other explaination of this other than i saw it.
content.summary: Huge ufo seen during geminid metor shower

content.detailedDescription:
at home at night after rainstorm, i went outside onto the front porch and stood at the corner of it facing toward town. i looked up at the sky and noticed a very dark cloud. while looking at the cloud, suddenly, there was a greyish white light that revolved around in the cloud. as the light went around from left to right, the light would disappear as if there were a solid object inside the cloud, only to reappear again, as if making a trip around a solid object.
   this occurred a few times, until there appeared a second light following the first one. they both revolved around the solid object a few times, until on one revolution, the second light caught up with the first light, and merged together, forming only one light revolving around object.
   i immediately thought the object was a ufo, and it was just silently hovering inside the dark cloud, making no noise whatsoever.
   i was not afraid while watching the revolving lights. i felt calm, and i had asked my mother to come out and look at it and she did, but for only a few seconds, then she went back inside her house, but i stayed there looking at the light revolving around the solid object.
   the object just hovered noiselessly inside the huge cloud. it appeared to be so low in the sky, i felt i could throw a rock at it, to describe how low it was. i thought the object had to be the size of a football field. 
   that's the best description i can give concerning the incident. 
i stood watching the object about ten minutes, then, i just calmly went inside the house. the object remained in the cloud as i left.
content.summary: Observed stationary object in cloud at night with revolving white light circling it after rainstorm.

content.detailedDescription:
On 12/8/10 i was driving home from dublin on 33 west at approximately  4:25pm.  it was a sunny and clear day. in the sw sky i spotted a shiny metallic cylinder-shaped object with a second one below it slightly moving back and forth as if suspended from the one above it.  both cylinders were vertical and slowly falling straight downward.  between trying to keep my eye on them and the road, i lost sight of it.  it certainly was not a plane and i saw it well before the marysville airport, i'd say about 7 miles.  there was one thing about the bottom cylinder that just looked different and it come to mind a day or two later that is wasn't quite shaped like the top one.  i believe the one beneath was damaged just by the shape of it.

after seeing the objects i became very excited and couldn't wait to get home and write down what i'd witnessed and was certain, with all the traffic around me, that someone else had to have witnessed it too.

i can still see the objects in my mind as if i am witnessing them over and over again.
content.summary: Sighted two cylinders in marysville area

content.detailedDescription: Walking on sidewalk on boggsford road just happened to look up at the morning  sky i observed a star like object with red and orange running lights. not a cloud in the sky neither the moon or the sun or aircraft was visible. it was motionless. from 630 am to 715 am. i saw it as i looked south.  every now and then i get glimpse of the object amongst the clouds.  i was excited and wanted to see  more.  so i continued on the sidewalk and ended  up at the dead end of  kendrew  and bogssford road. between the trees and the woods i continued to observe a glowing object. then the clouds covered it.  i have  documented the 45 minute walk on my tape recorder.  if any one would like to get a copy please remit *(email address deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Walking on sidewalk on bogsford road just happened to look up at the sky i observed a start like object with red and green running lights. not a cloud in the sky neither the moon or the sun or aircraft was visible. it was motionless. from 630 am to 715 am

content.detailedDescription: Let me no if this is ok i wrote you a message on your you tube channel im superallport the big ufo on here is the same as wat i seen in the same place the only differance is that it was at night and it had colours on it and it was flying very fast through the sky
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Started out stationary. then would move quickly to another location. got camera footage however most of the movement was my hand unsteady with the camera. you will see that it had seperate lights. couldn't see a shape but the three lights looked like a triangle from point to another. i showed a couple of people in the house and then grabbed the camera. the highest magnify was to 12x because i couldn't get focus past that.

*(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Red white and blue lights

content.detailedDescription: Hello i have lived in las vegas nv just about all my life i have seen very stage thing here but allmost everything i have seen in over sunraise mountan from the time i was just a kid i am now 29 and tonight just anothing thing i saw 2 lights at the mouton again this has been happen for a long time now but i dont understand y no one ever reports it i had video and gave it the the locel news and never saw it again so i thought i would go up there my self like i did tonight and to my saprise i was chast off by the milatery and it is a public road and a car foled me home tonight maybe its nothing but i would like to talk to someone about this in more detale so please email me at
content.summary: Milatry ufo

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened in april 2006. i do not remember the exact date. the sighting occurred after 14 hours.
 in the city of aruj��� in the state of sao paulo, near the international airport of guarulhos.

 at this time i was at work in the administrative building of the factory. i watched through the window what looked like a balloon, but not surprised. what i looked was the fact that approximately 15 minutes after the object was in the same place. a balloon would not stay in place after this time.

 i grabbed my camera and took three consecutive shots of the object that was above the trees. visually appeared metallic. remained static height, but seemed to spin a shaft. after taking the pictures was to show some friends from work just after the object disappeared.

 this was the second viewing of a total of 5, but only one that got visual proof.

 frankly i think this is a weather balloon, even being close (approximately 10 km) from the airport station. but the fact remains reasonable time stopped in the air intrigued me. normally a balloon moves because of the wind.

 in the picture the object is located just above the green concrete structure (the factory cafeteria.)
content.summary: Small, metallic, spherical and apparently static.

content.detailedDescription: Ok so one of my good freinds *(name deleted--cms/sg) was talking to me when we went for a walk onetime she told me that the night before she was walking her dog when a 3 bar shaped craft were flying slowly overhead with flashing lights like a plane suddenly the lights when out on them and came back on the craft were far over to the left a maneuver she thinks a jumbo jet cannot perform suddenly military helicopters showed up and the craft suddenly went super speed and took off with no noise and no after burner the helicopter and the newly arrived jets followed in pursuit she also said she tried to take a video of the craft but when she pointed her phone at them she felt a slight pule and heard a ringing in her ears and the phone died with full battery i dont know what to tell her
content.summary: My freind tells me of a strange ufo she saw the night before that was chased by military aircraft

content.detailedDescription: Looking out of the front of my house, saw a bright object come towar my house, it was moving. i went to my window in the back of the house, it was on the leftside and flying treetop level. no noise. top was a bright white, on bottom, red, blue and green flashing lights. when it came over my house it had shiffed direction.No noise.
content.summary: Saw a bright object come over my house, no noise and flashing lighrts.

content.detailedDescription: Suddenly, in the rear view mirror, i saw rectangular windows lit inside with something alive ( i hesitate to say they were human) moving around inside. i could not see the shape of the craft, only the windows. almost immediately, after checking the road (as i was driving), i saw a rear view mirror full of little dancing lights that were dancing in place. an instant later the little lights were no longer visible, but a blue area was visible with a little light adjacent to the opening. i thought the little light was the first star i saw that night, because it was the darkest night i had ever seen.A foggy haze had enveloped the little light just before i saw two more lights, about the same size as the first light,come into the opening as if they had come from behind a curtain (which was the black night sky). they passed through the opening and joined the first light. the opening disappered and the three lights, being in a random formation, came up behind the car as fast as you could blink your eyes. they were so still, they looked as though they were glued to the rear window. they made no sound. they were about five feet above the gold road, about three feet apart, and about five inches in diameter. after some time, two of the lights moved as if to pass on my right side, then they disapered,one light stayed with us just before we were going to cross hover dam. the light would not come into the lighted area with us. the light disapered just before the lighted area. during all the events taking place, i was trying decide if these lights were motor cycles, a big truck, a bus or a car. i did not consider at the time that these lights might be out of this world. how can a hole appear in the night sky and lights pass through it? how is that possible? i was not under the influence of anything! i was not even too tired to be driving! i was on the gold road to los vegas. just checking the rear view mirror. i thought the first object was a bus or train. my feelings were normal, i was not stressed, worried, or afraid. i know what i saw was real,i just dont know for sure what they were. i have not experienced anything like this since 1983.
content.summary: Rectangular object on gold road behind me-a million dancing lights in the rear view mirror-a hole in the night sky- lights passed through-they tailgated us !

content.detailedDescription: Not sure if the submission of the entire video and still posted, file may have been too large, here is clip slowed down at two key spots...That's about extent of my video editing skills sory, less frustrating for casual observers though.
content.summary: Video slowed down of day sighting

content.detailedDescription:
I will never think poorly of people trying to film ufo objects again, even in day and when they seem to have plenty of time to do a good job. 

i performed poorly  i saw this while standing in backyard about 45 minutes ago. got binoculars, odd not moving in any direction almost stationary. seemed at least twice as far away as jets flying into phoenix. almost directly overhead..Perhaps directly over city of west chandler.  

finally got husband and video camera and tried to film and get him to look, he did and said oh and went back in.  see how bad the video is, as camera was set on auto focus and very hard for it to focus in such bright sky and i could see nothing in the viewfinder screen in bright day ... 

anyway there are about 8 or so frames with this still photo level of resolution...Actually i can't say if there was one object or two b/c the shape changed while watching and video shows one.. then seemingly two..Not sure if that is digital artifact or not.

 and then about 15 frames with the object zoomed out...A bunch of bad footage and another spot with several frames.  here is original media and also the still i pulled.  again sorry to all who have to endure really bad video.

you will see it in first few seconds, again about half way, and then closer and brighter series of frames after that. you are welcome to original file. using panasonic handycam with up to i think 35x zoom (i think digital zoom turned off)

i think for some time i thought, got to be a ballon of some kind (we get many here, but they are close and brightly colored and drift well below airline path).

so, guess i better clean the lens, set up tripod and be poised again perhaps tommorrow?  i have run back outside now four times..Nada!
content.summary: Daytime object hovering/stationary at 2x plane height, drifts up or out of site

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting the following as given to me by a witness.

witness:

i have been retired from the army national guard for the past two years and three months. i served in the army national guard for twenty one years. my rank was staff sergeant. i have been deployed twice in my military carrier. my first deployment was desert shield and desert storm in 1990-1991. my second deployment was the iraq war in 2003-2004. in my twenty one years i have been trained to be observant, objective, and to be aware of my surroundings at all times. to include other types of training and to identify many types of enemy vehicles and aircraft at a distance, up close and by just their silhouette. during peace time training and war time deployments, i have seen aircraft ranging from spy drones, helicopters, fighter jets, stealth fighters, stealth bombers, large attack, cargo, and bomber aircraft. i have seen all these up close and afar. i have witnessed them fly by day, night and in adverse weather. i have witnessed some of these use their after burners in all of the for mentioned conditions. 

what i saw on 27 november 2010 was nothing i have ever seen before. i received my call to go to work at 0530 hrs. on 27 november 2010. i was scheduled to get on an empty coal train headed west to fremont, nebraska. my on duty time, as a conductor, was for 0700 hrs. me and my engineer, whom shall remain anonymous, got on board our train and departed at approximately 0800 hrs. and headed west. our arrival time at fremont, nebraska was approximately 1455 hrs. approximately 1500 hrs., we had stopped our train and were waiting for the out bound crew to arrive so they could relieve us from our train. it was a partly cloudy day with blue skies. i believe it was either cirrostratus or cirrocumulus type cloud cover that afternoon. as i looked into the sky, i witnessed an eastbound aircraft flying erratically. just like several of the other aircraft in the sky, i had believed this also to be a commercial or military aircraft due to the fact it was leaving a contrail behind it. it was flying at approximately the same altitude as some of the others. except this was making radical coarse changes. i observed it flying in an s pattern and the contrail actually ended up shaped like the letter s. it was now flying in a slight north easterly direction. i asked my engineer if he had seen what i had observed and he had no idea what i was talking about. i pointed to the sky in the direction of the aircraft and he said ���huh, it looks like an s���. he didn���t seem interested and continued to do his own thing. i continued to watch to see if it would make any other coarse changes. then i observed a grayish, dark looking void directly in front of the aircraft. this void was approximately four to five hundred yards long. the void appeared to be exactly the same width of the aircraft. then a weird thing happened. this void started to slightly curve to my left, (it���s right) and with the aircraft following, went back on coarse in it���s easterly direction. i continued to watch it, this time through the side window which was to my left facing south. at first i thought it was a trick of light, or something to do with the window, or the combination of the two. i then opened my side window and stuck my head out. the void was still there. i then looked at the other aircraft. not one had a void anywhere around them. what was strange, was that this void was not just cutting through the blue sky, it was cutting through the clouds and coming out of the clouds before the aircraft. the void look as though it was leading the aircraft. the length of this void never varied. it appeared as though the aircraft was flying into the void, but at the same time it appeared it wasn���t. like i stated before, the aircraft seem to follow it. the void was never behind the aircraft, nor was the aircraft surrounded by this void at any time. i studied this void for some time. i realized i could not see through it and there was no distortion of the sky or clouds around this void. i watched it until i could no longer see it. i could not identify what type of aircraft it was except to say, that it appeared to be the same size and similar shape as the others in the air that day. the aircraft appeared to be shiny and silver in color. i watched the other aircraft to see if this would happen again. i did not observe anything like this with any of the other aircraft that day or any aircraft in the days that followed. approximately three to four minutes had gone by from the beginning of my sighting to the end
content.summary: Object follows a grayish-dark looking void while changing course

content.detailedDescription: Please people, if your ufo is in the exact spot in the sky where venus is supposed to be, and you can't find venus,..Uh, your ufo is venus.
content.summary: Bright light in sky brighter than all other stars. is a planet.... not too bright!

content.detailedDescription: For the last week or so i have not been sleeping well so i will usually go outside and look around. i have noticed one light in particular in different spots on different nights. mostly in the south eastern sky over the gulf of mexico.  strangely it is only visible after usually of what seems to be the hours of 330 a.M- ? it has been cold so i have not actually sat to watch it. but recently i have been checking on it when i do see it and it will remain stationary and then will just be gone after a couple hours.  i am looking at it now and it is actually now showing different lights ! this is crazy! i don't know if it is playing tricks on my eyes but there is something definitely different and unusual going on here. it has been here every other night. i have flashed lights at it to try and get a response but i think it is to far away. but i can't really tell. it honestly doesn't look but to be a couple miles high. it is easily the brightest light in the sky and sticks out like a sore thumb. someone please help me understand this!
content.summary: Bright light in sky brighter than all other stars. not a planet.... too bright! stationary. only visible after330 am central timezone until

content.detailedDescription: I had just returned home from a little late night shopping at wal-mart around 1:30am. i was getting settled in and ready for bed, and had just come out of the bathroom from brushing my teeth. as i walked from the bathroom down the stairs to my bed-room i heard this extremely loud buzzing/humming/almost grinding sound coming from outside that was so loud the windows of my house were rattling. curious as to what it was and expecting to open the door to see a helicopter flying too low, or a low flying jet passing over i opened the door to look outside, only to see something i couldn't have ever imagined in my wildest dreams. peering out from the front door of my house facing south, directly in front of my point of view there was a large (guesstimating 150 ft. in diameter) metallic, solid black sphere hovering about 150 yards from where i was standing and maybe 150-200 feet in the air. directly in the dead center of the sphere was a blueish white sort of laser like beam spread out from the craft, and rotating back and forth and up and down very slowly as if it was searching for something, and as i was standing there this beam passed directly over me. i didn't feel any heat, or pain from it, i was only slightly blinded for a split second... but this was well after i'd gotten a good solid 20-30 second view of the object. the sound emanating from this object was this intense humming, grinding, almost like the sound made when you run over a tree root with a lawnmower, or when a construction worker is using a pile-drive minus the chipping sound, or when some1 presses down on an object too hard with a grinder, but consistent and continuous, and again,loud enough that the sound was rattling my 2 story house's storm windows. i'm shocked it didn't wake up the whole neighborhood. after watching for a good 20-30 seconds i wanted to document it somehow, so i ran into the house to grab my iphone with the hopes that the object was low and close enough that the resolution on my phone wouldn't have trouble capturing the object, as it usually does anything from a distance at night. here's where things get even weirder. the entire time i was in the house to grab my phone was all of 15 seconds. mind you, when i came outside at first the object was not moving, just hovering. within that span of 15 seconds i was inside, i came back outside to find that the object was gone from it's original spot, but i could still clearly hear it. thinking that it had to be nearby, i looked around, and then ran (as fast as i could in house shoes) around to the back of the house to find that the object had traveled at least 2 miles away and all i could see was the faint remnant of the beam still moving as if it was searching or scanning for something, before the object disappeared behind the ridge-line. i didn't bother trying to film, i knew it was too far away for me to have any chance of capturing. here's where it gets even more odd. as i'm standing watching it disappear behind the ridge-line, i hear another loud sound of a craft, only this 1 is familiar. i turn around to see 3 black helicopters in formation, flying very low, and hauling ass, with only their spotlights on facing directly in front of them. they followed the exact same direction i saw the craft travel. now, i have witnessed strange lights i couldn't explain in the sky before, i have even had 1 ufo experience in particular that altered my whole perception of how a viewed physics, reality, religion, and what i perceived as possible and impossible, but this... this was different. with all of those other sightings i got a sense of excitement, wonder, and even at times warmth and comfort. what i felt when i saw this object was an almost sickening sense of fear, discomfort, and dread. with all the other sightings i wanted to see it again, i was excited to have seen them. this thing... i wished i hadn't seen it, and it had me so uneasy i had a lot of trouble not picturing it when i was trying to sleep. every-time i got the image in my head, and remembered that sound it made, it sent chills up my spine. i'm asking the ufo community, any1 who reads this who has seen this object whether in person or in some kind of video they've seen to share their experience with me, as i'm hoping to find some answers as to why or even what this thing could have been. thank you for your time, and keep watching the skies!

It was late at night and i had just arrived to my home,  the time was about 2:04 a.M.  as i was parking my vehicle on the street by my house, i looked straight ahead out the front of my windshield to see what i thought was a shooting star but quickly noticed the ���shooting star��� never fell, instead it was traveling at an upward angle, it was pulsating three different colors, red, orange and white, it was never just one solid color almost like a flame would change colors, but it wasn't fire it looked like more of a glow.   i noticed this object seemed to have a tail at the end of it, the whole thing began moving upward then back down several times and moved like a caterpillar or a jellyfish. i couldn't believe what i was seeing, i quickly called my boyfriend and described the object and asked him to try to look for it where he was at,  but he was unable to see what i was seeing from his location, as i continued to watch this object in the sky for about 10 minutes it started looking more like just a star, what looked to be stationary so i hung up my phone and began taking pictures. i snapped 15 photos on my samsung behold ii, 5 mega pixel camera back to back, i left my finger pressed and did not release it, i had my elbows resting on the dashboard so that i wouldn���t move the phone. in all the photos the object is clearly in another position in the sky and moving up and down as if it was jumping around. i would have taken more photos however my phone had a very low battery and it shut off. i stayed staring at the object for and additional 10 minutes after the photos where taken then decided to go inside to charge my phone, i hesitated to exit my vehicle because i was a little frightened however, i was excited that i was able to capture it on my camera phone. i went inside and charged my phone about five minutes, in attempts to get video of it, but when i came back outside it was no where to be found. after watching this object in the sky for about 20 minutes i can definetly say that it was an unidentified flying  object... i just want to know if anyone else in the fort worth area seen anything similar to what i just described in the early morning of the 13th of january. i zoomed in and cropped all the pictures that i had taken of the object and made this slide. the pictures were all taken within 2 min. of each other. the object is clearly changing shapes, but you decide.
content.summary: Orange/red star-like glowing object changing shapes

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside of the staples center in downtown los angeles waiting to go to work in that building.  i was early so i reclined on one of the large, cylindrical concrete sculptures outside of the entrance near the convention center (essentially lying on my back).  i was looking upward at a patch of sky that was between the staples center and nokia center.  as there was a lakers game this night, there was commotion on the street and numerous spot lights were shining into the sky, criss-crossing each other.  i was watching these crossing lights and noticed that when one looked at a star, one could create an optical illusion such that the star looked like it was moving slowly in relation to the moving spotlights.

oddly, while observing this phenomenon, my eyes caught a small, orange, star or planet-like object that was genuinely moving.  i knew it was moving for real as opposed to the optical illusion i was noticing because i compared its motion to the stability of sky-scrapers and stars.  my heart began to race and i stood up still watching the object.  it was darting across the sky at a quick but not exceedingly fast rate.  it moved in seemingly random directions without stopping at all when it changed direction.  my first thought was that it was a reflection of some kind (perhaps a laser pointer) off of overcast/clouds/smog but the sky was clear enough to see stars even in downtown.  i wanted to call someone's attention to what i was seeing but did not want to lose sight of the object.  i considered the possibility of a helicopter but it was evidently much higher than a helicopter could possibly fly and moving in ways a helicopter could not.  it covered relatively large areas of sky in no time at all, but not such large areas as to seem completely impossible, but i have absolutely no knowledge of any human vehicle that could move in the same way.  i watched the light move around the sky for about 10 to 20 seconds.  the light eventually moved over the staples center from my perspective and i could no longer see it.  i walked partially around the building and was not able to locate it again.

my immediate reaction was a sense of some panic and shock.  i am a college educated person.  i am no ufo "nut" or devotee.  i have never been opposed to the idea of extra-terrestrials but i also have maintained skepticism.  i have never actively sought a ufo.  i have no real reason to believe that this incident does not have a logical explanation, but i can't think of what it would be.  i know what i saw, i just don't know what it was.
content.summary: Small, orangish light.  darting in seemingly random directions at a moderate-fast rate

content.detailedDescription:
Un-identified objects
now here is another strange happening in my young life. every sunday our family went to my grandparent���s house in salem, il. it was my mom���s mother and father. well after a great meal and always fresh homemade bread or rolls with lots of homemade butter. we all sat and watched tv or talked and enjoyed the rest of the evening. i was always the center of attention with my granddad.  he just loved to tease me or get me into trouble and mother would always come to my rescue and chew him out or make him stop. granddad should have got the whipping instead of me. but i always managed to get a whooping before we headed back home. 
well this sunday wasn���t any different from any other sunday at mamah and granddads house. and when we would get in the car, the 68 chevrolet biscayne, to go home, my favorite place was always laying on my back, in the back deck below the back window, so i could watch the stars twist and turn when dad would turn a corner or go around a curve. well this night it was a full moon. i watch the moon as we traveled towards home. that is when i saw two small bright white objects appear. they were round in shape, and circling around the moon. they each had different orbital paths and moved fast. i knew they were fast moving because as soon as they disappeared behind the moon they reappeared on the opposite side and traveled around the moon again. they were bright enough that you could see them when they moved across the moon. sometimes these two objects would travel around the moons outside circumference so they were always visible as they traveled around the moon.  i watched in amazement and being young 5 to 6 years of age, did not understand what i was seeing. i told my parents what i was seeing and they dismissed me again as if i were being silly. when i went back to look again these two objects were gone and i never saw them ever again.

the attached photo is a rendition of what i saw, that i created just for this report, it is not an actual photo of the objects i recall seeing. it was a clear night with many stars in the sky.
content.summary: Two bright white objects orbiting a full moon

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to smoke a cigarette at approximately 6:15 pm on january 12. after a minute or two i noticed a bright light high in the northern sky moving towards the south. i first thought it to be a flood or landing light on a aircraft but then realized it was too big and bright and never lost its intensity. i then opened the door and asked my wife to come outside and see if she could make it out. my wife and sister came outside and witnessed the obect. they too could not identify it because it had no distinct shape or lights of any color. it appeared as a bright star moving quickly but at a steady pace then instantly switched direction at the edge of ft. benning towards the southeast.

we watched it for a minute or so then my wife and i went back inside because it was rather cold outside. my sister stayed outside for another minute or so and came in and said that it continued towards the southeast then turned into a glowing red color that faded and then the obect was gone. my sister noted the time was 6:22 pm.

we watched the news to see if anything would be reported but no such luck. i would have thought that others had to see this object.
content.summary: On january 12th near ft. benning georgia, i seen a unusally bright star-like obect at a high altitude move from the north to south then switched direction towards southeast.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in rush hour traffic in the city. i was facing west in crawling traffic. the sun was low in the clear sky. as i creeped along,i was facing the sun, and couldn't wait to get under the over pass to block it. when i got that far, i could look towards the sun without blinding myself. while i was looking up, i first noticed a bright dot in the sky, just right of the sun. i thought it was wierd because it was in the foreground and should be dark. i continued to creep along and try to keep an eye on the dot. as traffic began to flow, i would look up each time i was facing west. the dot was still there and then, there were 2 bright white lines that were the same height in the sky and close to the dot. now i was really curious, again, there were no clouds and the sun was setting by now so it was weird that they were so bright and were "shimmering" like heat waves on hot pavement. then as i sat at a red light, faceing west, i was amazed to see a third white line and a second dot. the dots seemed to be stationary while the white lines slowy moved towards the first dot. then my street light turned green, i had to go. when i got to my destination, i quickly tried to go see the horizon again, but they had been slowly going the direction of the sun, not staying over one spot. and the sun was going down. i know what i saw and even called someone while i was driving(remember, crawling in traffic) to ask them to go outside and see if they could see what i could see but they weren't in a good spot to look west. i was mad at myself for not having my camera on me. not sure if it would have picked up the image. (facing the sun) i can assure you, it was not whispy clouds or stars. i saw something unidentifiable. in the past, late at night i have seen a small white object (not satellites)cross the sky and change direction, but kept it to myself. this latest one was worth mentioning. i'll be keeping my eyes on the sky from now on, and will surely have my camera with me.
content.summary: Three bright white lines with two dots. the dots were stationary while the lines slowly moved towards the dots. they seem to flutter like heat waves.

content.detailedDescription: While walking my dogs, i was looking up at the clear night sky.  there were plenty of airplanes flying by with their loud engines and blinking lights.  then i spotted one bright white light floating from the left side of the sky, then to the right.  it was going the same speed as the airplanes, maybe to blend in.  i don't think it made a sound.  all the planes had passed and if you could hear them it was very faint.  as close as this object was it should have been louder.  i stopped and stared as it slowly floated along.  then it went from white to red and disappeared.  almost like someone turned the light off. it was not an airplane!
content.summary: Non-blinking, star-like object flying past

content.detailedDescription:
At 11:20 my brother said come and check this out knowing that i am interested in anything out of place in the sky.I went out side and we watched an object that looked like a string or row of lights that moved left to right, up and down changing from a row of lights to a single light changing color and very bright, colors included blue red yellow purple green, this was not a helicopter plane satellite, space station or star, i got my camera and took pictures, i watched this object for 43 mins until it went down/landed at 12:03am, at the time i was on face book until he got me to come have a look at this out of place site,this was a ufo.Ps you may have to zoom in on the pictures to see more clearly.
thanks and warm regards *(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg).
for more pictures or details contact me on **(wit's email address deleted -- cms/sg).
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sting/row of colored lights

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were sitting by kmart upon the hillside hanging out chatting about life and what not.Then out of nowhere a diamond shaped ufo flew over us. we did not here it at all. it was completely soundless...If flew over us at a speed somewhat faster than an airplane.. i would say it was no more than a quarter mile up from our heads and it appeared to be about as big as football field. i myself did not feel frightened by it but i was intrigued and wanted to see more..Kind of hypnotizing..After it passed the trance i was in stopped and my friends and i all looked at each other and began to discuss enthusiastically what just happened and what we seen..We didnt come to any conclusions to what had just happened to us..But we all had agreed what it looked like and what it felt like.
content.summary: Diamond like with hollow circle in middle glowed at points and in middle
